helpMenu:
```Analyzer 1.0, a Leiji-themed Discord bot.

    @Analyzer Commands (Commands accessed by @ing Analyzer):

    @about - Analyzer will tell you about himself

    @calculate - Calculates the probability of a given scenario

    @cursedImageAlert - Posts a request for deletion of the previous post (as a joke)

    Analyzer will also respond to certain compliments, thank yous, and easter egg phrases

    

    !prefix Commands (Commands accessed by prefixing post with !

    !all series - Provides a list of all series in Analyzer's database

    !calculate - Calculates the probability of a given scenario

    !character-check - Format as: !character-check is CHARACTER in SERIES

    Confirms whether or not a recycled Leiji character appears in a series

    !characters - Format as: !characters in SERIES

    Provides list of characters that appear in specified series (limited to recurring characters)

    !content-warning - Format as: !content-warning SERIES NAME

    Provides content warnings for specified series

    !file - Format as: !file CHARACTER NAME

    Provides a random photo of requested character

    !help - Will make this appear

    !op - Format as: !op SERIES

    Posts a link to the OP of the specified series```
